detail_desc: Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Decorative gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back to add width, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and straight legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Longer cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a hood, long sleeves and no buttons.

Jacket in a sturdy pima cotton weave with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top, a yoke at the back and short cap sleeves. Elasticated drawstring seam at the waist and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Seamless thong body in soft, stretch fabric with a slightly deeper neckline at the back and folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under the clothes.
Trainers in multicoloured imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and ties at one side.

5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button. Decorative seams on the back pockets and decorative stitching on the legs.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Large scarf in a soft, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist, single back vent, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Sleeveless dress in patterned, organic cotton slub jersey. Shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Tie detail at the top, a concealed zip in one side, and a seam under the bust. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, flared top in jacquard-weave viscose with elastication and a small frill trim around the top and wide, bow-topped shoulder straps.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Top in satin with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined at the bust.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the top.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in patterned mulberry silk with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Shell necklace with a fabric cord. Adjustable length 31-40 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide, ribbed trim at the cuffs and hem.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.
Boots in organic cotton canvas with an ankle-height shaft and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in an organic cotton weave, and patterned soles.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and lined gusset. Sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems. Jersey lining.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit with a hole for the heel.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Trousers in soft leather with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with seams at the knees.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. These pared-back joggers are made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. They have covered elastication at the waist and hems, jersey-lined pockets in the side seams and an open back pocket.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set of a hoodie and leggings in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend. Long-sleeved hoodie with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Skinny fit leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Sports tights in jersey with a print motif, contrasting colour seams, visible elastic at the waist and a zip at the hems.
Wide jumper in a soft, loose rib knit with dropped shoulders, sleeves that end just above the wrist with sewn-in turn-ups, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a shimmering metallic pattern. Round neckline, press-studs at the front, small frills at the top with overlocked edges, and narrow, covered elastication around the hems.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High stand-up collar with a zip at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Sleeve pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud. Soft brushed inside.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps and buttons at the sides. Chest pocket, side and back pockets and slim legs.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front, fake welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and elasticated crossover straps at the waist and sides.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sports jacket with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Round neckline, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.
One-shoulder blouse in a cotton and linen pattern weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Jumper in soft, airy, fine-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar, decorative hole-knit sections, extra-long sleeves and roll edges around the collar, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
